name: Flying Car Games: Flight Sim
description:
Awwh! Here it is, the most amazing car simulator game is here. A combination of both furious car driving game and flying cars high in the sky is here for you, as you are a flying car games lover.
Drive in the city streets and turn on the airplane mode by just clicking a button and then the pilot seat will be all yours. Fly in the sky and enjoy pilot feel.
Perform crazy stunts in the sky and try to collect all the coins to get maximum rewards in the end of each level. Drive, Fly and drift in this new “Flying Car Games: Flight Sim”.
Features:
- Extreme City Drive.
- City Car Driving.
- Flying Car Mode.
- Coins Collection Missions.
- Detailed 3D models.
- Realistic Physics.
- Cars to Choose in.
- Entertaining Game-Paly.
